value.string:
""" Create a reversal transaction from current tansaction. """
 
 N_ = context.Base_translateString
 accounting_module = context.getPortalObject().accounting_module
 is_source = context.AccountingTransaction_isSourceView()
 
 if is_source:
 section = context.getSourceSection()
 mirror_section = context.getDestinationSection()
 payment = context.getSourcePayment()
 mirror_payment = context.getDestinationPayment()
 date = context.getStartDate()
 mirror_date = context.getStopDate()
 specific_reference = context.getSourceReference()
 else:
 section = context.getDestinationSection()
 mirror_section = context.getSourceSection()
 payment = context.getDestinationPayment()
 mirror_payment = context.getSourcePayment()
 date = context.getStopDate()
 mirror_date = context.getStartDate()
 specific_reference = context.getDestinationReference()
 
 reversal = accounting_module.newContent (
 portal_type='Accounting Transaction',
 source_section=section,
 destination_section=mirror_section,
 source_payment=payment,
 destination_payment=mirror_payment,
 start_date=date,
 stop_date=mirror_date,
 title = N_("Reversal Transaction for ${title}",
 mapping={'title': unicode(context.getTitleOrId(), 'utf8')}),
 description = N_(
 "Reversal Transaction for ${title} (${specific_reference})",
 mapping={'title': unicode(context.getTitleOrId(), 'utf8'),
 'specific_reference': specific_reference}),
 resource=context.getResource(),
 reference=context.getReference(),
 causality_value=context,
 created_by_builder=1 # XXX to prevent init script to create lines
 )
 
 # use AccountingTransaction_getInvoiceTransactionLineList to keep a consistent
 # ordering
 line_list = context.AccountingTransaction_getInvoiceTransactionLineList(
 portal_type=context.getPortalAccountingMovementTypeList())
 line_list.reverse()
 for line in line_list:
 new_line = reversal.newContent( portal_type='Accounting Transaction Line', )
 if is_source:
 new_line.edit(
 source=line.getSource(portal_type='Account'),
 destination=line.getDestination(portal_type='Account'),
 destination_section=line.getDestinationSection(),
 source_payment=line.getSourcePayment(),
 destination_payment=line.getDestinationPayment(),
 quantity= -line.getQuantity(),
 source_total_asset_price=line.getSourceTotalAssetPrice(),
 destination_total_asset_price=line.getDestinationTotalAssetPrice()
 )
 else:
 new_line.edit(
 source=line.getDestination(portal_type='Account'),
 destination=line.getSource(portal_type='Account'),
 destination_section=line.getSourceSection(),
 source_payment=line.getDestinationPayment(),
 destination_payment=line.getSourcePayment(),
 quantity=line.getQuantity(),
 source_total_asset_price=line.getDestinationTotalAssetPrice(),
 destination_total_asset_price=line.getSourceTotalAssetPrice()
 )
 
 return context.REQUEST.RESPONSE.redirect("%s/view?portal_status_message=%s" %
 (reversal.getPath(),
 N_("Reversal Transaction for ${specific_reference} created.",
 mapping={'specific_reference': specific_reference})))
